content: Loved this app so much i had to buy the full version my son was born at 23 weeks so he was deleyed some in talking not onky did this app help learn some signs but he started talking while using this app ‚ù§ hes now 6 and is one of the smartest kids in his class i am now teaching baby brother whos 8 months signs also my oldest worked this app by him self at age 2 he loved it
Can't save favourite signs. And signs a poorly animated with too much focus on animated babies mouth and not on the hand doing the action. Mostly a waste of money.
Love it, My Grands learn sign & say the words
I really like this ap. The only thing i wish they could change is to see which sins are missed on the quizzes.
selected bsl, half the signs were incorrect
I've taught myself to sign as I taught my grandkids using this app. Now, my adult daughter's are signing as well. We love to sign to songs.

Very disappointed Only reason I gave a star was to be able to write a review. I purchased to teach my 2 yr old who is not talking yet & is a late talker to learn more sign language. Shes only able to use this app successfully when assisted and app doesnt seem to be geared towards children. Ive found only adults/children who can read are able to navigate it. I would absolutely find app helpful If it were just me using it. &When going to uninstall the refund button disappeared?!?! Just a heads up
Worth getting    Worth getting
My daughter speaks the words with the signs. It has increased her speech amazingly! This is an added bonus I had not expected and I can't thank you enough!
Not many BSL signs and also some are incorrect. Pretty gutted that I paid for this app and it's pretty useless for me unless I want to teach my baby ASL  (which I dont)
I have used this since 2013 for my daughter. I am a sign language interpreter. The signs use to all be correct but now most of them are incorrect. Disappointing!

I love the baby keeps my todddlers attention. It would be easier for an arrow to be present so the kids could go on to the new word instead of having to go back to the homescreen. Could that feature be added? Otherwise my littles love it.
The words need to automatically advance instead of having to tap go back and tap again

I selected BSL and have a union jack in the background. However, just noticed bath is in ASL. If it's a deliberate attempt to simplify some difficult signs, it should be  indicated where none BSL signs are used.

Good app but as others have mentioned the video demos are too fast.  No sooner has the app loaded the screen to show the video of the selected word its half way through it.  App needs small pause before video and a repeat button rather than automatically going back to the word list after the video.  Also number of signs in not 300 it's about 90 for BSL.  The catagory Places has only 2 in it, one of them being Farm.  All in all useless.
Excellent.

Just purchased. Very cute animations. Clear speech with Auslan. Would be great if there was a play or return button on each video. playing once isn't enough before returning to word list. Some play alittle too quickly and it's harder for very young ones to focus that quick.  But well done we're loving it.
Very easy app! :)
Not as many words as I hoped it would have but its enough to teach my hypotonia infant how to sign for now...
Sometimes I had to go online to watch a real person sign and explain
I have this on my iPad and the one thing my grandson really likes are the numbers.

This was such an easy way to start learning.  My daughter with special needs started signing her 1st sign within 4 days and has done amazing with this app! Love the quiz feature and baby voices, adorable & works! Thank you so much for this app!
Easy to learn. Just needs more signs.
Great app

Very educational. I used this with my grandson, and it really works. He would get so frustrated trying to tell us when he needed something. Now he just sign and tell us exactly what he wants. I think he loves it the most. Now he knows how to communicate what he want, instead of crying out of frustration. He a very happy baby now. Thank you so much!!!

My 1.5 year-old's most favorite game. She's picked up almost all of the signs and repeats the word too! She blew my mind when she accidentally went into the quiz and started answering! I think the babies mesmerize her- she gets bored with all the other games, exits and finds her "babies". We have the other singing app too- wish there were more!
please add a replay button it make this app even better
It's a good app, but it really needs the flash cards that are in the ipad version, and a replay button. Adding the descriptions of the sign would also be great.

I personally have found this app so informative an accurate. Combining officially recognised and natural sings. My 3 year old granddaughter who has basic speak ability for her age group quickly picked up on all signs showed. I highly recommend you download the light app and soon as you see how good it is you will download the full app. I did have to use their customer support, and this was first class. Well done everyone thank you.
I wish there was a way to have the baby repeat with out going back to the normal screen.  But that is trivial.  This does all I want it to! It is great having it handy when I can't remember a sign!

Someone fix the program please! Ive installed this app 2 times  Trying to get the BSL signs. And the ones that are downloaded when you select BSL arnt british signs theyre american. I feel ripped off.
My nonverbal child uses these signs to talk and express himself. This is by far and away the very best app for sign language for children! Love love love. Thank you
Hope that the vocabulary is added to...furniture, body parts, etc. But great job on it overall!
The apps sucks 15mb data just to open it. That's gonna get expensive.
I cannot believe I played for this app I tried to open it and it just closed and went back to my home screen.... Don't buy it!!
I paid for this app now have new phone and keep getting error download
I love this app but i wish it had a bigger selection of words. My daughter really loves to use this app. N it teaches me too.
Still unable to install after uninstalling!!

Great app, graphics are wonder, and its easy to use interface but...need more signs like; the alphabet, numbers,  body parts,  more food...meats,  more furniture, etc.. Also there needs to be a replay button, as it becomes redundant for teaching toddlers with the break in between just to play the same word over an over...please fix
It needs a repeat function and add more signs...

Brought this app after using the light version. My daughter loved it, and the little animation clips were great. Then I discovered that despite clicking for the bsl signs,  some of the signs weren't bsl. A great shame as it's useless to me now and it could have been very helpful.
Its an okay app but the apple stores version has flash cards thats more easier for my 2 year old to use. Wish this version had the flash cards as well.

I have ben trying to install this app for two hours. I want mutt money back. I should not have to keep installing then installing and nothing happens.	I have installed, reinstalled and still nothing. I want my money back. This should not keep happening.
I can't even download this app. I tried it 5x!
Would like it to have a replay option for each sign rather than having to go back to the list and choose it again.  Also for the quizzes to quiz on the signs the user has reviewed already.
I bought this to communicate with a special needs child. We now "talk" and that's awesome....  Thanks!

I purchased the full version and each and every time it says not enough space on as card..now it's saying I may have a bad as card...I have been deleting all kinds of apps just to have this one work and I am not happy....The lite version ran fine and we use it and that's why I purchased the full.  I feel like it is a dud, since it will not load.

I bought the full version so wanted to delete the trial version. When I opened the trial version and uninstalled, it automatically uninstalled the version that I paid for and left me the trial version. I want it back but don't want to pay for it again. I would say 4 stars on the app but 2 because of the problem.
replyContent:
It sounds like you have inadvertently uninstalled the Full version instead of the Lite version. To resolve the issue, simply reinstall the full version from Google Play. You will not be charged again to install the app as you have already paid for it.
I hope you find this information helpful.

content: This takes 45 minutes to load!!!  It happens each time you open the app.   I uninstalled and reinstalled and still having issues
I love it.
I just downloaded this today. It was recommended by my son's speech therapist. I'm very impressed and plan on using this every day with my son!
Really helpful and easy to use well worth the money. Hoping more signs get added over time.
Love the update!
Well done on creating categories. Searching much faster now. Could do with more vocabulary but this is definitely on it's way to be really useful for me and my boy
I bought this app because my son loves it on iPad- he likes the songs. Any way to get them here?
replyContent: It sounds like you may be looking for one of our other apps, it's called "Baby Sign and Sing". It features 10 signed nursery rhymes. You can find it on Google Play by searching for "Baby Sign and Sing".

content: My daughter loves this app. Things that would improve it... 1. search engine 2. More words

Big scrolling list of signs doesn't really help when you are first starting out with 5-10 words.  Please add a star toggle (favourite) next to each sign, then a second list showing just the favourites.  Also can't seem to figure out how to change languages.
What a hell?  Can t download the videos! !? It just not right
Has no alphabet. This is the basic to start learning auslan.
BSL vocab list is a bit short

There is no ability to search for signs, you have to scroll through them all. I'd also like to be able to save a list of the current signs we are learning so I can quickly check it. That aside it's a good app.
Stupid thing will not download its been a week of installing and uninstalling over and over again  uuuuggghhhh REFUND! !!!!
It helps me communicate with my little girl
Works great for me. HTC desire bravo. Thanks
Ba
Omg! Wont download its videos unless u have the app open cant make calls nothing too agrevating dont download. I want my money back!
2nd time is the charm! 1st time was a bomb! But uninstalled and reinstalled and it worked!! Very excited to see it work properly!!
I able to update at all even the ASL language. Fix it man.
I used to love this app but with new update the content will not download! So frustrating. . . Please fix!
I downloaded this app about two weeks ago and it has yet to finish installing...it gets to about 92% and then starts all over. Sucks I paid for it!
My biggest complain is that I have to scroll for every word, it would be nice to either slide to letters or search words
My baby just love it, i just wish it was longer
Im glad to see improvements have been made. & I love the update but now I cant use it! Its not compatable with my samsung galaxy SII.
Download error fixed....my son loves this app
My 15 month old loves this app. But I downloaded the update and it has taken almost a complete day to download. That is a little ridiculous!!!
Hasn't worked in two weeks! I want my money back

Awesome on Nexus 7. Love that I can now have just auslan instead if a mixture. But since update won't download to Motorola Xoom.  Very dissapointing.  Would be five stars if it worked on both.  My 18 month old loves it we have been teaching him auslan for a year now and it has been a helpful tool.
U guys did great with the latest up date. Thanks for listening to our suggestions.

The voices on this one all seem to have a thick British accent that was not present on the free iPad version.  A long download and then it frequently force  closes.  No way way to play all like free version  you have to push them one at a time
My son loves this app. Hes 9 months and whenever he wants something he signs it.

I'm so disappointed. I had the lite version and was very impressed so I decided to by the full version. After the large and lengthy download, all I get is sound but no picture. What's the point in that for a signing app!
Nice!!
Cute! I like it ..
Easy for grandparents
Easy, fun, good app for quick look up.

Disappointed with how few signs there are. Think you need to at least add them periodically so that we can update with new ones as and when they are added. Simply wanted something like 'always' or 'forever'.... Please add soon?! Thanks

Really engages my almost 1 year old. Would to see a few more sign such as no, yes, stay, go and hot. Would also like to be able to group them in some way so i can just concentrate on a teaching a few at a time. Maybe group like words together too.
My sons favorite one is baby.
I liked the application but thought that it needed  a written description.  The ipad app has the written description. Hope they put that on the android app.
Totally awesome. I have twin 12 month olds and not only am I teaching them to sign the love to watch the babies. I use it to keep them busy at the doctors office. Its great
Only gives you one question at a time despite saying it will ask 5
I love it.
Plays a video and then crashes, even with the supposed bug "fix".

Penelope loves this app and ask for it as soon as she wakes up in the morning. I would have rated this app higher but my gripe is that Android users gets shafted. Not only do we pay more than the Apple users, but we get less. The ipad app has a flash card feature that allows you to quiz your child and take pictures of the corresponding words. If you're in the market for this app do yourself a favor and buy the one for the ipad/iphone.  To the developers: hopefully this will reach your ears and you can add the flash card feature as an update.
I expected more signs.
Yes and no.  and many more. Come on update PLEASE!!!
Needs no, yes, sorry, more animals and black, in Auslan. Makes it hard without these signs, please add more signs!!!!
As it is so brilliant it will show you how to do the sign and make it clear and fun for you and your baby. Could no recommend enough!

Does what it says. Had some trouble with my phone having the wrong locale setup so was getting wrong videos. Quick response, just had to get an app to fix my locale then d/l new videos. Recommended highly!
Yes no naughty etc please!
Would change to 5 star if no, yes,naughty,carefull and good morning and good night where added please add vital words
My 2 year old loves to imitate these cute little babies. Worth the money,plenty of signs to start with.
Great Auslan resource had all the signs I was after
Doesn't display anything just sound on Galaxy S. Uninstalling but probably wont get money back as videos(that didn't work) took 20 minutes to download
